name: openapi-request-validator
description: A simple program that validates HTTP requests against OpenAPI specs. Useful for debugging validation errors.

scripts.test:success: node openapi-request-validator.js examples/openapi.yaml POST /users examples/create-user.json && node openapi-request-validator.js examples/openapi.yaml PUT /users/{id} examples/update-user.json && node openapi-request-validator.js examples/openapi.yaml POST /orders examples/create-order.json && node openapi-request-validator.js examples/openapi.yaml GET /users && node openapi-request-validator.js examples/openapi.yaml GET /orders
scripts.test:failure: node openapi-request-validator.js examples/openapi.yaml POST /users examples/invalid-user.json; if [ $? -eq 1 ]; then echo 'Expected validation error ‚úÖ'; else echo 'Test failed: Expected validation error but got success ‚ùå'; exit 1; fi
scripts.test: npm run test:success && npm run test:failure && echo '' && echo 'üéâ All tests passed! OpenAPI Request Validator is working correctly.'
